home.mathBattles: Math Battles Community - synergy in numbers, unity in minds
home.kids: Children from various backgrounds from all over Kazakhstan gather here in Almaty to share the joy of math in a challenging and fun competition.
home.onlineParticipants: online participants in the last tournament
home.offlineParticipants: offline participants in the last tournament
home.fund: total prize money awarded to winners
home.republicanOlympiadParticipants: National Math Olympiad medalists among our participants
home.republicanOlympiadJury: National Math Olympiad medalists among our adjudicators
home.about: Maths Battles Community is a team of talented math and science olympiad contestants. Our diverse and welcoming community of problem solvers uplifts both students and educators to shine their talents by creating innovative STEM and EdTech solutions.
home.ourMissionContext: Our aim is to spread the joy of learning new things and solving complicated problems with as many people as possible by organizing tournaments, camps, online and offline courses and lessons that are made available to everyone interested. We gather people from all over Kazakhstan to promote the exchange of ideas and foster a passion for mathematics through friendly competition. Our events are just as enriching for our team members and we welcome all interested mathematicians to join us.

our-team.weAre: We are the Maths Battles Community, a large nonprofit tournament organization.
our-team.primaryGoal: Our primary goal is to develop teamwork and collaboration among students passionate about mathematics.
our-team.popularizationContext: Promoting the Olympiads movement among school students as a means of nurturing the intellectual elite of the country and encourage people from underprivileged backgrounds
our-team.collaborationContext: Supporting interactions and experience exchange among the country's brightest minds through teamwork and cooperation within the teams, organizers and volunteers
our-team.funContext: Our Math Battles are always a stressful event - olympiads always are! But out team does their best to moderate the experience and make sure the competition is fun and fair for everyone.

gallery.selection: A selection of photos from our events.

registration.registration: Registration Form for Almaty Maths Battles 2025
registration.registrationContext: Before filling out this form, make sure you've read and understood the rules of the tournament. You can edit your response after filling out the form via a letter from Google Forms that will be sent to your email. Please note that teams must consist of either 4 or 5 participants.
